title: "It Will Be Beautiful and Impressive": Nikas Safronov Unveils International Art Series in India
description: New Delhi [India], November 28: This December, two inaugural exhibitions by People's Artist of the Russian Federation Nikas Safronov will be staged in India with the support of Rosneft Oil Company. According to the artist, the project will be realised to a high technological standard and will serve as the starting point of a significant international exhibition program. In an interview with the Russian newspaper Vedomosti, Safronov discussed his creative inspirations, his attitude toward commercial success in art, and the use of artificial intelligence in painting.
